info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 01 at 7:37PM PDT until August 01 at 8:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN, EAST CENTRAL NYE AND NORTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 737 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated that the thunderstorms which produced heavy rain has pushed east, however, runoff from local washes may continue to result in flash flooding. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Lincoln, East Central Nye and Northwestern Clark Counties FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
